title: (VIDEO) JVPs Anura Kumara exposes fraud and corruption in Sri Lanka
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The JVP or the People’s Liberation Front convened a special media briefing on Tuesday (3) morning to expose corruption and fraud in Sri Lanka.
China supports Sri Lanka’s decision to work with IMF in restructuring debt – Ambassador
India assures continued support to Sri Lanka; High Commissioner meets Finance Minister
